DOC.brief_summary: The goal project useful clinical instrument diagnosis treatment residual limb volume fluctuation individual use prosthetic limb . One hypothesis test instrument effectively measure short long term volume fluctuation individual trans-tibial amputation . Another hypothesis test subject add sock insert prosthesis residual limb volume decrease , remove sock insert residual limb volume increase .
DOC.criteria: transtibial amputee regular prosthetist wear prosthesis least five hour per day . Inability ambulate continuously prosthesis ( without use assistive device cane walker ) 10 minute indoors level walkway . 2 . Inability shift horizontal vertical posture 30 second .
